resources.string: Electrician Pro Tools
Complete toolkit for professional electricians - calculations, layouts, management tools and more

The ultimate electrician\'s companion with comprehensive tools for every aspect of electrical work. Features include precise calculations for box fill, conduit fill, and dwelling loads; pipe bending assistance; lighting layout design; augmented reality visualization; measurement tools; project management with checklists, inventory tracking and job scheduling. Perfect for apprentices and master electricians alike.

Calculate box volume and fill capacity according to NEC requirements. Includes support for different box types and automatic calculations based on conductor count, device counts, and clamp requirements.
Complete dwelling unit load calculations per NEC Article 220. Calculate service size, feeder requirements, and load distribution for residential projects.
Determine appropriate conduit sizes based on conductor type, size, and quantity according to NEC fill requirements. Includes common conduit types and wire configurations.
Calculate precise measurements for conduit bends including offsets, saddles, and 90Â° bends. Features adjustable bend radius and comprehensive bend guides.
Design efficient lighting layouts with calculation tools for light levels, fixture spacing, and energy usage. Includes common fixture types and room templates.
Visualize electrical installations in real-time using augmented reality. Position fixtures, panels, and devices in the real world to plan installations and present to clients.
Utility tool for counting taps when locating wires or breakers. Features visual and audio feedback.
Specialized calculator for working with fractions and mixed numbers common in electrical measurements.
Customizable checklists for installation, inspection, and maintenance tasks. Includes templates for residential, commercial, and industrial work.
Track tools, materials, and equipment for projects. Manage stock, create orders, and generate material lists for jobs.
Plan and schedule jobs, track time, and coordinate with team members. Includes calendar integration and notification features.
